purpose: Facilitate deep learning research by providing a modular and configurable framework for model training and evaluation
principle: Utilizes a plugin-based architecture to enable flexible configuration and integration with various deep learning libraries and datasets
reusability: Offers a modular framework with plugin support, allowing researchers to easily integrate custom models and data processing pipelines
limitations: Currently in alpha stage with limited documentation; primarily aimed at experienced users familiar with deep learning concepts
name: deep-research-mcp
